entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
